definition: to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
green pest prevention and control/environmentally friendly methods of pest control and prevention
pinyin: bing4 chong2 hai4 lu:4 se4 fang2 kong4

sentences.english: The first part introduces the outline of our traffic developing in Changde.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为常德市交通违法的防控策略。

sentences.english: Efforts are now focused on preventing the spread of the parasites.
sentences.chinese: 防控举措如今集中在防止寄生虫的传播上。

sentences.english: Finally, establishing the international cooperation mechanism of anti-network spy.
sentences.chinese: 最后着手建立防控网络间谍窃密的国际合作机制。

sentences.english: Wang Longde said that AIDS prevention and control of the Government's efforts alone are not enough.
sentences.chinese: 王陇德说，防控艾滋病单靠政府的力量是远远不够的。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, some consideration was given to the crime prevention, control and defeat in Tanggu district.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是对塘沽区的犯罪打防控展开思考。

sentences.english: AIDS prevention and control of the situation is changing, Fang Yi countermeasures are "frequent new tactics."
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病防控形势在变，防艾对策也在“频出新招”。

sentences.english: The prevention and control of pick-pocketing is a social system project.
sentences.chinese: 扒窃行为的防控是一项社会系统工程。

sentences.english: Are there better methods of monitoring MRSA control than bacteraemia surveillance? An observational database study.
sentences.chinese: 有没有比菌血症监测更好的监督MRSA防控的方法？

sentences.english: Lower-income countries generally have lower capacity for the prevention and control of noncommunicable diseases.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，低收入国家防控非传染性疾病的能力较低。

sentences.english: Reporting any signs of disease is key for surveillance and control measures.
sentences.chinese: 对任何疫病迹象进行报告是监测和防控措施的关键。

sentences.english: Tangkou Security Control efforts to increase coal companies.
sentences.chinese: 唐口煤业公司加大治安防控力度。

sentences.english: Third, further enhance entry-exit health inspection and quarantine measures based upon the epidemic situation development.
sentences.chinese: 加严检疫措施，进一步加大口岸疫病防控力度。

sentences.english: The third part studies the control system of crime by passion.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分为激情犯罪防控机制研究。

sentences.english: In public security, continued improvements were made in the crime prevention and control system and extensive efforts were made to promote peace and security.
sentences.chinese: 社会治安防控体系不断完善，平安创建活动广泛开展。

sentences.english: China Centers for Disease Control and Prevention already had delivered 10000 plague prevention leaflets to the quake zone.
sentences.chinese: 中国疾控中心已经往震区运了1万份疫情防控宣传单。

sentences.english: Preventing and controlling operation risks is a long-term and demanding task faced by bank industry.
sentences.chinese: 防控操作风险是银行业面临的一项长期而艰巨的任务。
